languages.text: "Довольно пустой болтовни. Я там, где должна быть — и этого довольно".

traits.locale_text: "Каждая минута, проведенная в праздной болтовне, крадет чью-то жизнь руками подонков и предателей. Я — там, где должна быть. Этого достаточно".

languages.text: "Enough idle chatter. I am where I must be, and that will suffice."
languages.original_text: "Довольно пустой болтовни. Я там, где должна быть — и этого довольно".

traits.locale_text: "Every minute spent in idle chatter robs a soul of their life through the actions of scoundrels and traitors. I am where I must be. That will suffice."
"Every minute spent in idle chatter robs a soul of their life through the actions of scoundrels and traitors. I am where I must be. That will suffice."
"Every minute spent in idle chatter robs a soul of their life through the actions of scoundrels and traitors. I am where I must be. That will suffice."
"Every minute spent in idle chatter robs a soul of their life through the actions of scoundrels and traitors. I am where I must be. That will suffice."
"Enough idle chatter. I am where I must be, and that will suffice."

languages.text: “闲聊就到此为止吧。哪里需要我，我就在哪里，这就够了。”
languages.original_text: "Enough idle chatter. I am where I must be, and that will suffice."

traits.locale_text: “到此为止吧。我们浪费在闲聊上的每一分钟，都会有人因为叛徒与异端分子而丧命。哪里需要我，我就在哪里，这就够了。”

languages.text: «Basta de charla. Estoy donde debo estar. Eso es todo».
languages.original_text: "Enough idle chatter. I am where I must be, and that will suffice."

traits.locale_text: «Cada minuto que perdemos con cháchara irrelevante permite a los villanos y traidores arrebatar otra alma. Estoy donde debo estar. Con eso basta».

languages.text: 「無駄話はもう十分でしょう。我はいるべき場所にいる、それで十分だ」
languages.original_text: "Enough idle chatter. I am where I must be, and that will suffice."

traits.locale_text: 「無駄なおしゃべりに費やす一分一秒が、悪党や反逆者の行動と言う形で人の魂を奪っているのよ。私は自分がいるべきところにいる。それだけで十分です」
「無駄話はもう十分でしょう。我はいるべき場所にいる、それで十分だ」

languages.original_text: "Enough idle chatter. I am where I must be, and that will suffice."

languages.text: « Pour l'heure, nous avons assez perdu de temps en bavardage. Je suis ici à ma place, et il faudra vous satisfaire de cette réponse. »
languages.original_text: "Enough idle chatter. I am where I must be, and that will suffice."

traits.locale_text: « Chaque minute passée à discuter laisse le temps à un scélérat ou à un traître d'arracher la vie d'une âme innocente. Je suis ici à ma place, il faudra vous satisfaire de cette réponse. »

languages.text: "Genug geplaudert. Ich bin, wo ich sein muss, und das reicht."
languages.original_text: "Enough idle chatter. I am where I must be, and that will suffice."

traits.locale_text: "Jede Minute tatenloses Geplauder beraubt eine Seele durch das Handeln von Schurken und Verrätern ihres Lebens. Ich bin, wo ich sein muss. Mehr ist nicht zu sagen."

languages.text: "Bu kadar sohbet kâfi. Olmam gereken yerdeyim, bunu bil yeter."
languages.original_text: "Enough idle chatter. I am where I must be, and that will suffice."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kadar sohbet kâfi. Olmam gereken yerdeyim, bunu bil yeter."
